<title level="1" right="Trait">[Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=661)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

Attacks with this weapon are [nonlethal](/Rules.aspx?ID=2311), and are used to knock creatures unconscious instead of kill them. You can use a nonlethal weapon to make a lethal attack with a –2 circumstance penalty.
name: Nonlethal
